name: I Don't Want To Die
description:
CONTROLS :

OLD MAN :

W - S  + Mouse for direction

GHOST :

WASD + Mouse + LeftClic to shoot 

STORY
You are an old man. But you don't want to die today ! Try to escape Death itself and its minions in a terrific graveyard. If you die, you can still try to join your body back, but beware of the spirits !
Programmation/ Music / Sound / Level Design / Animation : JamesAdams Design and Graphics : Stormozz
